data.eml:eml: Revision of the Neotropical green lacewing genus Ungla (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tauber, Catherine A., Sosa, Francisco, Albuquerque, Gilberto S., Tauber, Maurice J. (2017): Revision of the Neotropical green lacewing genus Ungla (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae). ZooKeys 674: 1-188, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.674.11435, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.674.11435
